info.title: MyGame-V2
info.description: My chess is an online web games allow people can play chess or tic tac toe and share their happiness across the world. This website is inspired by Chess.com and Steam.

tags.name: admin
tags.description: service for administrator, have to login and with role is ADMIN

post.description: Registered users can login to establish their identity with the application using the API below. The login operation requires two properties: username and password.

400.description: user is not found or wrong password

data.description: it type any base on your api

field.description: field will be the name of invalid field

post.description: The Logout operation terminates user session.
The register API can be used to create user accounts in the application. A registration request must provide a user object as a collection of key/value properties.
Create an email is sent with a link to a webpage which contains a form where the user can enter the new password.

requestBody.description: provide an email to send an otp key

200.description: The mail has been sent successfully.

400.description: too many request, mail does not exist, or server cannot send

post.description: Create an OTP code is sent to the user phone number. Users can use it to access a webpage which contains a form where the user can enter the new password.

requestBody.description: provide phone number to send an otp key

200.description: The OTP code has been sent successfully.

400.description: too many request, phoneNumber does not exist, or server cannot send

post.description: Check-otp API is user to check a OTP code is exist or not.

get.description: Mychess integrates with Google to support user authentication and login into a Mychess application with a Google account.
Mychess integrates with Github to support user authentication and login into a Mychess application with a Github account.
Mychess integrates with Facebook to support user authentication and login into a Mychess application with a Facebook account.
Create an io cookie and return it to clients.

200.description: The server creates io cookie successfully.

403.description: client is not a user

post.description: The support API allows users to send their problem to our support team.

get.description: This API get information of the current user from server and return it to client without some sensitive fields.

200.description: The server returns user information without some sensitive fields.

put.description: User property values of the logged in users can be updated with this API operation.

requestBody.description: user basic information is not include some sensitive fields

get.description: This API get user information base on id parameter is provided and return it to client without some sensitive fields.

200.description: The server returns any user information without some sensitive fields.

400.description: user with the given Id was not found

put.description: This API allows user to upload their avatar image.

400.description: The avatar file is required, The avatar file couldn't be uploaded. Photos should be smaller than {{size}} MB, The avatar file couldn't be uploaded. Photos should be saved as JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP files

500.description: Internal server error from aws server, upload failed to aws server

put.description: Changes the passwords of users in the native realm and built-in users.

requestBody.description: provide new password and current password to change password by user

400.description: The user password is not correct

put.description: Allow user to enter new password with OTP code is provided.

requestBody.description: provide new password to reset password

403.description: OTP code is not correct, OTP code is invalid

put.description: Allow user to update information with OTP code is provided.

403.description: OTP code is not correct, OTP code is invalid

post.description: Create an OTP code is sent to the user phone number. Users can use it to access a webpage which contains a form where the user can update phone number.

200.description: The OTP code has been sent successfully.

400.description: The user has requested too many times, please try again after 30 minutes, The user phone number is taken by another user

500.description: Internal server error from sms server

post.description: Create an email is sent with a link to a webpage which contains a form where the user can update email.

200.description: The mail has been sent successfully.

400.description: The user has requested too many times, please try again after 30 minutes, The user email is taken by another user

500.description: Internal server error from email server

post.description: This API allows user enter a name of another user to find out their information.

get.description: Get all users information except some sensitive information.

200.description: The server returns array of user information.

403.description: user is not an admin

404.description: user is not found

put.description: Toggle user status from true to false and vice versa (block user).

404.description: user is not found
